trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: PowerShell, cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0, and for special features, such as Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE), CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico lista os requisitos do sistema para o Windows PowerShell 3.0 e Windows PowerShell 4.0 e recursos especiais, como o ISE (Ambiente de Script Integrado) do Windows PowerShell, comandos CIM e fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Windows® 8.1 and Windows Server® 2012 R2 include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: O Windows® 8.1 e o Windows Server® 2012 R2 incluem todos os programas necessários.

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico foi criado para usuários de versões anteriores do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de sistema operacional

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 4.0 é executado nas seguintes versões do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1, instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012 R2, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2, instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para executar o Windows PowerShell 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run Windows PowerShell 4.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para executar o Windows PowerShell 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 é executado nas seguintes versões do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows 8, instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2012, installed by default
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012, instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: Windows® 7 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows® 7 com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server® 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server® 2008 R2 com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run Windows PowerShell 3.0
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 com Service Pack 2, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o Windows PowerShell 3.0

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Microsoft .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 4.0 requer a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1 and Windows Server 2012 R2 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: O Windows 8.1 e o Windows Server 2012 R2 incluem o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 requer a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012 include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: O Windows 8 e o Windows Server 2012 incluem o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 por padrão, o que atende a esse requisito.

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), veja [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) no Centro de Download da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), veja [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Instalador da Web)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) no Centro de Download da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS\-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 e Windows PowerShell 4.0 exigem o WS\-Management 3.0, que dá suporte ao serviço WinRM e ao protocolo WSMan.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Esse programa está incluído no Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 e Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: Instrumentação de Gerenciamento do Windows 3.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 e o Windows PowerShell 4.0 exigem a WMI (Instrumentação de Gerenciamento do Windows) 3.0.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0, and Windows Management Framework 3.0.
trans-unit.target: Esse programa está incluído no Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows 8, Windows Server 2012, Windows Management Framework 4.0 e Windows Management Framework 3.0.

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: Se este programa não estiver instalado no computador, os recursos que exigem o WMI, como comandos CIM, não serão executados.

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime 4.0

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 4.0 are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 3.0 e o Windows PowerShell 4.0 são compilados no CLR (Common Language Runtime) 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos da interface gráfica do usuário

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell é um aplicativo baseado\-em console que não requer uma interface gráfica do usuário.

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: Como tal, é ele adequado para computadores que não têm telas, monitores ou uma interface do usuário, como as opções de instalação Server Core do Windows Server 2012 R2 ou Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, alguns itens, como os seguintes, exigem uma interface do usuário gráfica.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte o tópico de ajuda para cada item.

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Integrated Scripting Environment (ISE)
trans-unit.target: Ambiente de script integrado do Windows PowerShell (ISE)

trans-unit.target: Cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parâmetros

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Parâmetro **ShowWindow** do cmdlet [Get-Help](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a).

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Parâmetro **ShowSecurityDescriptorUI** dos cmdlets [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) e [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 4.0 is designed to be backwards compatible with Windows PowerShell 3.0 and Windows PowerShell 2.0.
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 4.0 é projetado para ser compatível com o PowerShell 3.0 e o Windows PowerShell 2.0.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and Windows PowerShell 3.0 run unchanged in Windows PowerShell 4.0.
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets, provedores, snap\-ins, módulos e scripts escritos para o Windows PowerShell 2.0 e Windows PowerShell 3.0 são executados sem alteração no Windows PowerShell 4.0.

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, Windows PowerShell host programs that were written for Windows PowerShell 2.0 and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in Windows PowerShell 3.0, which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, devido a uma mudança na política de ativação de tempo de execução no Microsoft .NET Framework 4, os programas host do Windows PowerShell escritos para o Windows PowerShell 2.0 e compilados com o CLR (Common Language Runtime) 2.0 não podem ser executados sem modificações no Windows PowerShell 3.0, que é compilado com o CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: O mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0 requer o Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 no mínimo.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito é atendido pelo Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito não é atendido pelo Microsoft .NET Framework 4 e versões posteriores do Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como adicionar ou instalar o mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0 e adicionar ou instalar as versões necessárias do Microsoft .NET Framework, consulte [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md) (Instalando o mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0, consulte [Iniciando o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0](Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Ambiente de Pré-instalação do Windows

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell 2.0, Windows PowerShell 3.0, and Windows PowerShell 4.0 run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: O Windows PowerShell 2.0, o Windows PowerShell 3.0 e o Windows PowerShell 4.0 são executados no Windows PE (Ambiente de Pré-Instalação do Windows).

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, não há suporte para os seguintes cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets do BITS (Serviço de Transferência Inteligente em Segundo Plano)

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRM** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o serviço do **WinRM** não está presente no Windows PE.

trans-unit.target: Consulte Também
